name: Rotten Potter
description:
How to Play

Try and figure out the recipes to make the dish. Try to get more than 60 points to win. You lose if you get lower than that.

You will get penalty for ingredients that you use up if the dish is incorrect.

You will get more points the harder the recipe is.

Controls

Use 1, 2, 3 keys to quickly put ingredients (fish, meat, vegetable) respectively or press the ingredients icons.

Press enter key or click the cauldron to make the dish.

Press backspace if you made a mistake, this will remove the last ingredient.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

P.S. This was meant to be a game for a weekly jam but failed to make it.  This game was only made under a day and is a bit rough. Thanks and have fun.
